    public class HttpResourceConverter
extends org.fcrepo.kernel.api.identifiers.IdentifierConverter<org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource,org.fcrepo.kernel.api.models.FedoraResource>
    Convert between Jena Resources and JCR Nodes using a JAX-RS UriBuilder to mediate the URI translation.
    Since:
    10/5/14
    Author:
    cabeer
